      • is_valid_up

        boolean is_valid_up​(int yRow,
                    int yCol,
                    int row,
                    int col)
        Method to determine if move is valid for the up.
        Parameters:
        yRow - Row value of the selected cell.
        yCol - Column value of the selected cell.
        row - Row value of the slot that user wants to go.
        col - Column value of the slot that user wants to go.
        Returns:
        boolean to specify if the move is valid.
